question: Match the following:
I. <katex>$Zn^{2+}$</katex> ... i. <katex>$d^{8}$</katex> configuration
II. <katex>$Cu^{2+}$</katex> ... ii. colourless
III. <katex>$Ni^{2+}$</katex> ... iii. <katex>$\mu=1.73BM$</katex>
explanation: I. <katex>$Zn^{2+}$</katex> is <katex>$3d^{10}$</katex>, no unpaired electrons, so it is colourless (ii). II. <katex>$Cu^{2+}$</katex> is <katex>$3d^9$</katex>, 1 unpaired electron, <katex>$\mu = \sqrt{1(3)} = 1.73 BM$</katex> (iii). III. <katex>$Ni^{2+}$</katex> is <katex>$3d^8$</katex> (i).
